course.title: The Complete 2021 Flutter Development Bootcamp with Dart
course.subtitle: Officially created in collaboration with the Google Flutter team.

reviews.body:
The Course is amazing ,and angela is great ,i am in love with animations that they used .they have to update this course for new students who join course .

thanks for making course

Angela is an amazing instructor. She gives you analogies and clear explanations for every concept. You might find yourself stuck in some places, but after looking at what she did, you'll be like 'Oh...'. But, overall, this was an amazing course.

Sehr durchdachter und gut strukturierter Kurs. Inhaltlich erhält man auch alles was nötig ist, um programmieren zu können. Zwischendurch erhält man sogar paar Motivationsvideos mit paar allgemeinen Tipps. Das einzige, was ich mir noch wünschen würde wäre mehr Inhalt bzgl. Software-Architekturen und wie diese in Flutter umgesetzt werden.

Amazing tutor. Highly recommend. Her voice is the main factor that made me complete this course. Although I don't know her Chinese name, her English name is quite apt. She is indeed an Angel in my life.

I would like to geniunely thank Dr. Angela for this course, she has really nailed this one. Just from finishing this course, I'm confident with my Flutter skills. I believe some familiarity with OOP would help you with this one though.

Angela is a great instructor. She knows that in a course like this, there would be moments of frustrations & low motivation. With the help of her short tips at the end of each module is really helpful in keep going.
It is a great course for any beginner who wants to learn app development. Angela as an instructor is a dream come true, she teaches in the best way possible.

learned everything that needs to start, before that course I wasn't familiar with Object-Oriented Programing languages but Angela thought me very well so it was a great journey before I was starting the course I thought I will complete it in one or two weeks but it took me two months to complete with constantly learning it was great experience Thank you Angela.
One of the best course for flutter Development in unity. Angela is a great teacher and I love how she keeps motivating you after each module. Thanks so much for this wonderful course!
Best course out there, explanation is excellent, now that I have completed, hoping to change career now, goodluck for me : )

What else is there to say .. One of the best courses for flutter on the internet, one of the top courses here on udemy. Grasping a new technology is a breeze these days with this kind of content available. Thanks for the amazing experience I had taking this course.
Taking this course was a really enlightening experience for my Mobile App Development career. Although there is very little support from the creator, I did get good support from community

instructor.name: Dr. Angela Yu
instructor.briefIntroduction:
I'm Angela, I'm a developer with a passion for teaching. I'm the lead instructor at the London App Brewery, London's leading Programming Bootcamp. I've helped hundreds of thousands of students learn to code and change their lives by becoming a developer. I've been invited by companies such as Twitter, Facebook and Google to teach their employees.

My first foray into programming was when I was just 12 years old, wanting to build my own Space Invader game. Since then, I've made hundred of websites, apps and games. But most importantly, I realised that my greatest passion is teaching.

I spend most of my time researching how to make learning to code fun and make hard concepts easy to understand. I apply everything I discover into my bootcamp courses. In my courses, you'll find lots of geeky humour but also lots of explanations and animations to make sure everything is easy to understand.

I'll be there for you every step of the way.
